Payroll

Class Parttime

  • java.lang.Object
    • Payroll.Employee
      • Payroll.Parttime

  • public class Parttime
extends Employee
    Extends the employee class and includes specific data and operations to a parttime employee.
    Author:
    Craig Li, Prerak Patel

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Checks if an object has the same profile as a parttime employee.
        Overrides:
        equals in class Employee
        Parameters:
        obj - the object whose profile is being compared to a parttime employee's profile.
        Returns:
        true if the object is a Parttime employee, false if not.

      • calculatePayment

        public void calculatePayment()
        Calculates and sets the payment of a parttime employee based on hours worked and hourlyRate. Will provide payment at 1.5x normal rate above 80 hours per pay period.
        Overrides:
        calculatePayment in class Employee
